description:
The tool converts orphaned OST files to PST, including emails, attachments, contacts, and calendars with 100% precision.

The tool converts orphaned OST files to PST, including emails, attachments, contacts, and calendars with 100% precision.
Highly recommended by MVPs and IT administrators.

- Converts inaccessible, orphaned, encrypted, or IMAP OST to PST.
- Supports Outlook 2021, 2019, 2016, and earlier versions.
- Migrate Offline OST files to Microsoft 365 or Office 365 (Technician)
